articles.title: Trump trial: Live updates from di ex-president hush money case
articles.excerpt: Donald Trump first criminal trial now don start, with a full jury wey dem swear in on Thursday.
articles.summary:
Live updates from Trump-Stormy Daniels hush money trial
Live updates from Trump-Stormy Daniels hush money trial
Wia dis foto come from, Getty Images
6 minutes wey don pass
6 minutes wey don pass
Donald Trump first criminal trial now don start, with a full jury wey dem swear in on Thursday.
Mr Trump, 77, dey charged with 34 counts of fraud, related to hush-money wey dme pay to porn star Stormy Daniels before di 2016 election.
E don plead not guilty to 34 counts of falsifying business records and also deny say e get affairs with Daniels.
Ms Daniels allege say she and Mr Trump nack for 2006 - something wey e don deny - and say dem pay her money to stay quiet about am in di lead-up to di 2016 election, wey Mr Trump win.
Di trial dey centred on one reimbursement Mr Trump make to im former personal lawyer and "fixer", Michael Cohen.
Cohen, 57, claim say dem direct am to pay Ms Daniels $130,000 (£104,000) in exchange for her silence about her alleged affair with Mr Trump. Prosecutors don describe am as an attempt to "unlawfully influence" di 2016 election.
Hush money payments no dey illegal. But di Manhattan District Attorney Office allege say Mr Trump commit crime by improperly recording di money wey e use take reimburse Cohen as legal expenses.
In total, dey dey accuse am of 34 counts of falsifying business records in di first degree.
David Pecker, former publisher of di National Enquirer wey buy and bury damaging tori about Trump, dey expected to be di first witness for di prosecution.
Dis now how di mata dey waka so far on Day one.
As Donald Trump bin dey enta court for di first day of di historic trial of a former president, e stilll stop to follow tori pipo tok.
E repeat im belief say di trial na "very unfair" kind of "election interference".
Di Republican nominee also use di opportunity to tok about im recent civil judgement for New York. E complain say state attorney general Letitia James dey "question di bonding company" wey e take put im $175m bond payment.
Dem still get hearing for di bond mata today too. Trump get case for two judges front for Monday morning.
E tok say "I get plenti money to pay" before e call New York "di most unfriendly place to do business".
Before e enta court room, e end di tok-tok say "na very very sad day for America".
Di court case wey start even wit di wahala to get di jury wey go run di case, still get some comma.
Justice Merchan postpone di trial time small sake of say one of di jurors bin get emergency dental appointment.
According to di Justice, anoda juror don dey fear sake of di media attention di case get and "no sure if dem wan even dey here today".
Las-las, di juror gree to remain afta small jor-jor for im robe room.
Wia dis foto come from, Reuters
Two groups dey for di Collect Pond park wey dey outside di Manhattan court wey now dey open to di public.
One policeman wey dey di door say dem don divide di park to di pipo wey dey for Trump and against am and dem get sperate door for dem.
Dis na so di two groups no go join and cause wahala.
Dis trial, wey go be di first criminal trial for US ex-president, na for business fraud wey connect wit di hush money payment wey dem pay ex porn star Stormy Daniels.
Prosecutors dey allege say Trump make om personal lawyer, Michael Cohen pay di money but den Trump record am fraudulently say im pay di money to Michael Cohen to repay am for legal expenses wen na payback for di hush-money payment. Na wia di alleged offence dey be dat.

articles.title: Trump trial: Stormy Daniels, Michael Cohen, Allen Weisselberg, David Pecke, Karen McDougal Key players for former US president criminal case
articles.author: Article Information
articles.excerpt: Dem include one judge and prosecutors wey don tackle oga Trump bifor, di former president defence team and several interesting witnesses.
articles.summary:
Di main people for Donald Trump shut up-money trial
Di main people for Donald Trump shut up-money trial
Author, By Madeline Halpert & Phil McCausland
Role, BBC News, New York
4 minutes wey don pass
4 minutes wey don pass
Wen former president Donald Trump go sidon for di defence table for di wood-panelled Manhattan courtroom for di next several weeks, some characters wey you fit say dem carry dem come from one Hollywood blockbuster go follow am dey dia.
E get one long list of interesting potential witnesses - one adult film actress, one fixer wey turn star witness, one loyal money man wey dem convict of tax fraud, one gossip newspaper publisher, plus odas – wey dem fit call to testify.
One white-collar defence attorney wey don bet im career on defending Trump na im dey lead di former president defence team.
Manhattan first black district attorney don gada crack team of Manhattan goment lawyers wey dey familiar wit Oga Trump and im organisation.
And di entire case dey under one ogbonge New York Supreme Court judge wey sabi Trump courtroom troubles and behaviour wella.
Trump dey face 34 charges of faking business records to hide shut up-money wey im bin pay one woman wey im allegedly bin get affair wit.
Here na all di main characters you need to know as di first former president for US history dey face trial to defendant for criminal case.
New York judge
New York judge
Wia dis foto come from, Reuters
Justice Juan Merchan – di ogbonge New York judge – im bin don spend time before wit Trump for Manhattan courtroom.
Justice Juan Merchan – di ogbonge New York judge – im bin don spend time before wit Trump for Manhattan courtroom.
Na im bin judge di Trump Organization tax fraud case wey lead to heavy fine and jail time for di company chief financial officer, Alan Weisselberg.
E mean say di judge understand Trump and im courtroom tactics to delay, deny and deflect.
Dat behaviour dey likely to irritate Justice Merchan. While im fit get soft voice, im get di reputation of no-nonsense jurist.
Already, im bin don shut Trump up one time during jury selection.
Meanwhile, Trump claim for social media say "im never ever see judge wey confuse like dis one", and im don attack Justice Merchan daughter – wey dey work wit one law company wey dey work wit Democrats.
Dem don bar Trump since, from speaking about di judge family.
Manhattan goment lawyers
Manhattan goment lawyers
Wia dis foto come from, Reuters
Alvin Bragg - di Manhattan district attorney – become di first black man to lead Manhattan District Attorney office wen dem bin elect am for November 2021.
Alvin Bragg - di Manhattan district attorney – become di first black man to lead Manhattan District Attorney office wen dem bin elect am for November 2021.
Im take over di investigation of Trump and announce say im office go bring felony crime charges against di former president last April.
Bragg adopt one new legal theory wey go turn any offence, falsifying business records, into crime.
Im bin allege say Trump change di records to cover up second crime - violation of New York campaign-finance laws.
Im office allege say Trump campaign bin try to hide di affair from voters before di 2016 election.
Law experts dey get double mind weda di gamble go work, but Bragg don gad togeda experience team of goment lawyer wey bin dey very familiar wit Trump to make di case.
Joshua Steinglass - Trump trial goment lawyer - help lead di prosecution of Trump Organization, wey lead to di conviction, and now dem add am to dis team.
Joshua Steinglass - Trump trial goment lawyer - help lead di prosecution of Trump Organization, wey lead to di conviction, and now dem add am to dis team.
Oga Steinglass, wey go direct di goment lawyers efforts for trial, don try high-profile murder and manslaughter cases plus oda violent crimes before.
Di prosecution team also include Susan Hoffinger , di chief office investigations division wey bin work on Trump Organization tax case before; Christopher Conroy , wey don work on di investigations of Trump di longest; and Rebecca Mangold , goment lawyer wey specialise on economic crimes.
Susan Hoffinger, di chief office investigations division wey bin work on Trump Organization tax case before; Christopher Conroy, wey don work on di investigations of Trump di longest; and Rebecca Mangold, goment lawyer wey specialise on economic crimes.
Former President defence team
Former President defence team
Wia dis foto come from, Getty Images
Todd Blanche - Trump top trial lawyer - na former federal prosecutor, registered Democrat and im dey live for New York City, but don carry all dat one throw inside dirty.
Todd Blanche - Trump top trial lawyer - na former federal prosecutor, registered Democrat and im dey live for New York City, but don carry all dat one throw inside dirty.
Blanche leave very correct position wey im dey work as partner for one Wall Street law firm, become Republican and move to Florida to take di biggest client of im career – Oga Trump.
Im bin be colleague of Alvin Bragg some time back, di lawyer wey dey prosecute di former president, Blanche go now sit on di oda side of di courtroom from am.
Dis go only be for di second time. Im bin only serve as defence lawyer for one oda criminal case wey bin go trial.
Susan Necheles - Trump lawyer – don represent Trump for cases since 2021, but she get long history of defending politicians wey enta trouble, real estate developers and organised-crime figures - like Venero Mangano, wey be underboss of di Genovese crime family wit di nickname Benny Eggs.
Susan Necheles - Trump lawyer – don represent Trump for cases since 2021, but she get long history of defending politicians wey enta trouble, real estate developers and organised-crime figures - like Venero Mangano, wey be underboss of di Genovese crime family wit di nickname Benny Eggs.
She bin represented di Trump Organization wen dem find am guilty of criminal tax fraud plus fine dem $1.6 million fine for December 2022.
Gedalia Stern , na partner for Necheles law firm, and Emil Bove , na former federal giment lawyer, both of dem na also Trump defence team.
Gedalia Stern, na partner for Necheles law firm, and Emil Bove, na former federal giment lawyer, both of dem na also Trump defence team.
Potential witnesses
Potential witnesses
Wia dis foto come from, Getty Images
Stormy Daniels - adult film star – meet Oga Trump for 2006 for one celebrity golf tournament for Nevada.
Stormy Daniels - adult film star – meet Oga Trump for 2006 for one celebrity golf tournament for Nevada.
She bin dey 27-years-old dat time, but Daniels - real name Stephanie Clifford – don already become rising star for di adult film industry.
She claim say Trump ask her for sex in offensive manner, and di two have sex soon afta introduction.
Trump deny say e no happun, but Daniels allege say dem give her $130,000 (£105,000) shut up-money wey Michael Cohen - lawyer for Trump Organization – pay her just before di 2016 election to keep quiet about di affair.
Since her allegation become public, she become frequent target of Trump and im aupporters, but she say she dey committed to testifying against di former president.
Michael Cohen - di fixer – begin work as Trump personal lawyer for 2006.
Michael Cohen - di fixer – begin work as Trump personal lawyer for 2006.
Im bin plead guilty to federal campaign finance crimes for 2018 over paying di shut up-money to Ms Daniels, but im insist say im dey send di money on Trump direction.
Im allege say di former president bin try to cover wetin happun and avoid scandal by repaying Cohen through series of payments wey dem record as legal expenses.
Trump call im former friend a liar, and im legal team attempt to block Cohen testimony.
E get one time, Cohen say im go take bullet for di former president, but im later become key witness for investigations of Trump - including Robert Mueller investigate into allegation say Trump campaign gang wit Kremlin.
Allen Weisselberg - di convicted money man – im go be regular face for di criminal trial, though im fit no testify.
Allen Weisselberg - di convicted money man – im go be regular face for di criminal trial, though im fit no testify.
Di former chief financial officer of di Trump Organisation, Weisselberg allegedly arrange for Trump to reimburse di shut up-money payments and help cover dem up.
Weisselberg no be stranger to di former president legal troubles.
For August 2022, di Trump Organization executive plead guilty to tax fraud, di falsification of records plus oda crimes.
Na Manhattan district attorney investigation of Trump Organization lead to di charge.
Wia dis foto come from, Getty Images
As part of im plea deal, im served 100 days for prison, and also agree to testify for di ongoing case against Trump company.
Im later testify for New York civil trial against Trump, but im go need to plead guilty to two charges of lying under oath soon afta.
Court sentence am to five further months in prison on 10 April.
David Pecker - di tabloid publisher - na former CEO of American Media Inc. (AMI), di parent company of National Enquirer.
David Pecker - di tabloid publisher - na former CEO of American Media Inc. (AMI), di parent company of National Enquirer.
Wen im bin lead di gossip newspaper, im bin pursue practice of "catch-and-kill" to support Trump 2016 presidential run.
Im do am by buying di rights to stories wey put Trump for bad light.
Im go den refuse to publish dem, diafore effectively suppressing di damaging information.
Karen McDougal – di Playboy model – claim say im bin get illegal affair wit Trump for 2006 and 2007, wey di former president deny.
Karen McDougal – di Playboy model – claim say im bin get illegal affair wit Trump for 2006 and 2007, wey di former president deny.
She say American Media Inc. di parent company of National Enquirer, pay her $150,000 for her story. E force her to keep quiet about so call encounter.
Dino Sajudin - na former Trump Tower doorman – im fit take di stand.
Dino Sajudin - na former Trump Tower doorman – im fit take di stand.
